actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide that increases in rates of pay for Members of the House of Representatives under section 225 of the Federal Salary Act of 1967 shall not take effect before the Congress following the Congress in which such increases are recommended.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Salary Act of 1967 to prohibit increases in rates of pay for Members of the House of Representatives from taking effect before the Congress following the Congress in which such increases were recommended.

titles.title: A bill to provide that increases in rates of pay for Members of the House of Representatives under section 225 of the Federal Salary Act of 1967 shall not take effect before the Congress following the Congress in which such increases are recommended.
